summary: This bill, the Collaborative Forest Landscape Restoration Program Reauthorization Act of 2025, aims to reauthorize and amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009. It focuses on the Collaborative Forest Landscape Restoration Program, modifying aspects like addressing species and pathogens, monitoring, staffing plans, implementation mechanisms, and funding. The bill also adjusts funding levels, reauthorizes the program, and includes provisions related to wildfire risk reduction, watershed health, and specific implementation strategies.
